resources.string:
By default Android (up until version 15) disables vibration when battery saver is ON, meaning you will miss calls or other important notifications if you set your phone to vibration only. 
 
Vibration Enable restores vibration by using a dummy Accessibility service andâ€¦ that's it! This is enough to make the phone vibrate again, no data will ever be collected (you can have a look at the source code). 
 
You will probably need to enable "Restricted Settings" for the app, you can learn more here. 
 
ðŸŽ‰ If you would like to support my work you can buy one of my apps, Thank you! ðŸŽ‰
Turn on this service to bring back vibration even when battery saver is ON.
